attributes.action: accept the country has lost faith in the government and house and call a immediate general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following all of the recent revelations regarding expenses, regardless of it being a fault of the system or the MP's concerned, I no longer have any belief that this government can conduct itself in a way that puts our interest first.
They remind me of Pigs with their snouts in a trough, so 'SnoutGate' seems a reasonable label.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
